mapper.sql: a.id, a.username, a.password, a.phone, a.email, a.created, a.updated
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user ( username, password, phone, email, created, updated ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.update: update tb_user set username=#{username}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, updated=#{updated} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_user where id in #{id}
mapper.select:
select from tb_user as a
and a.username like concat ('%',#{pageParams.username},'%')
and a.email like concat ('%',#{pageParams.email},'%')
and a.phone like concat ('%',#{pageParams.phone},'%')
limit #{start},#{length}

select count(*) from tb_user as a
and a.username like CONCAT ('%',#{username},'%')
and a.email like CONCAT ('%',#{email},'%')
and a.phone like CONCAT ('%',#{phone},'%')
